name: sharry
description: Sharry is a self-hosted file sharing application that lets users upload files and share links with expiration and optional passwords. It supports user accounts, quotas, and a polished web interface.

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Share files of any size with automatic chunking for large transfers

features.title: Password Protection
features.description: Secure shared files with optional passwords for recipient access

features.title: User Accounts
features.description: Create accounts with individual quotas and sharing permissions

features.title: Download Limits
features.description: Restrict number of downloads per shared link

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Send share links directly to recipients via email

features.title: Alias Management
features.description: Create memorable aliases for share links instead of random strings
